artist: Maker: Unknown; Publisher: Black Kettle Graphics, San Francisco
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Single leaf, photomechanical reproduction of a linoleum print of a nude female figure squatting inside of a sun printed in offset lithography on coated paper; set of 5 postcards in plastic sleeve
title: Anti-Hype, vol. I: The three positions of life (5 of 5)
